title: Wtf? Wheres my Illaoi skin?
body: Ok short story, i bought illaoi and i just hit level 5, i got my ward skin and then i see a get woad king darius. Wtf? i only own illaoi where is my void bringer?

replies.body:
Oh man, I think I see what went wrong here. That Day One Chest is designed to give you a random skin of 975 RP or lower for one of the champions you owned. If none of those skins are available, it will just give you a random skin for a random champion. 

In your case: the only champion you owned when you opened that chest was Illaoi. Sadly, the only skin she has right now is Void Bringer, which is over 975 =/ . Since the Day One chest doesn't count 1350 RP Skins, it gave you a random one which turned out to be Woad King Darius. I hate that you ended up with a skin you can't use right now, but I won't be able to switch that skin for a different one.
okay, i don't like the bad news but thanks for explaining
Now i baught yasuo because he was in my shop (i didn't own hin when i opened hextech)
